title: Społem font
content:
[http://mojwroclaw.blox.pl/resource/spolem1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123041950/http:/mojwroclaw.blox.pl/resource/spolem1.jpg "http://mojwroclaw.blox.pl/resource/spolem1.jpg")

Any idea what font is it?  
And where I can get it?
author: Pablo135

comments.content:
I think this might even predate WW2. I doubt anything like this was done during the Communist era and it certainly isn't modern, although the cladding on the wall looks recent.  
There is a slightly Bauhaus look to the p,o and e.

I was looking at a similar sign in Bytom last week but that had more familiar Art Deco styling, and had completely lost its neon.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123041950im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Gloria_6347.jpg)
